def-en: In the context of a graph, patterns, numerical summaries, and statistics that can be calulated on the graph (without reference to the meaning of the information contained in the graph).
def-ga: I gcomhthéacs graif, patrúin, achoimirí uimhriúil, agus staitisticí ar féidir iad a áireamh ar an ngraf (gan trácht ar brí / ciall an eolais sa ngraf).
notes: Téarma luaite le brí comhchosúil sna foclóirí thuas.
